title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2132/93 of 28 July 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3892/92 fixing, for the 1993 fishing year, the withdrawal and selling prices for fishery products listed in Annex I (A), (D) and (E) to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2132/93 of 28 July 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3892/92 fixing, for the 1993 fishing year, the withdrawal and selling prices for fishery products listed in Annex I (A), (D) and (E) to Council Regulation (EEC) No  3759/92
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annexes I, II, III and IV to Regulation (EEC) No 3892/92 are supplemented by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 January 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1993.
For the Commission
Yannis PALEOKRASSAS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 388, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 76, 30. 3. 1993, p. 12.
(3) OJ No L 392, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 41, 18. 2. 1993, p. 12.
(5) OJ No L 174, 17. 7. 1993, p. 1.
